mapper.select: SELECT MAX(p.pay_no) AS max_pay_no, g.game_title, g.game_total, g.game_level, g.game_no, g.game_content, m.member_name, f.filegame_name, MAX(p.pay_date) AS pay_date, MAX(p.pay_enddate) AS pay_enddate, COALESCE(SUM(s.group_cnt), 0) AS total_group_cnt FROM pay p JOIN game g ON p.game_no = g.game_no LEFT JOIN studygroup s ON p.game_no = s.game_no AND p.member_id = s.member_id LEFT JOIN filegame f ON g.game_no = f.game_no JOIN member m ON p.member_id = m.member_id WHERE p.member_id = #{member_id} GROUP BY g.game_no,g.game_title, g.game_total, g.game_level, g.game_content, m.member_name, f.filegame_name ORDER BY pay_enddate ASC

SELECT MAX(p.pay_no) AS pay_no, g.game_title, g.game_total, g.game_level, g.game_no, m.member_name, COALESCE(SUM(s.group_cnt), 0) AS group_cnt, p.pay_date, p.pay_enddate FROM pay p JOIN game g ON p.game_no = g.game_no LEFT JOIN studygroup s ON p.game_no = s.game_no AND p.member_id = s.member_id JOIN member m ON p.member_id = m.member_id WHERE p.pay_no = #{pay_no} GROUP BY g.game_no, g.game_title, g.game_total, g.game_level, m.member_name;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO studygroup (game_no, group_name, group_intro, member_id, group_cnt, group_startdate, group_enddate) VALUES (#{game_no}, #{group_name}, #{group_intro}, #{member_id}, #{group_cnt}, #{group_startdate}, #{group_enddate});
mapper.select:
SELECT sg.group_no, sg.group_name, sg.group_startdate, sg.group_enddate, sg.group_cnt, sg.group_nowcnt, g.game_title, g.game_level FROM studygroup AS sg JOIN game AS g ON sg.game_no = g.game_no WHERE sg.member_id = #{member_id}
AND sg.group_name = #{group_name}
SELECT group_name, group_no FROM studygroup WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND group_enddate >= CURDATE()

SELECT m.member_name, m.member_phone, m.member_email, m.join_date, g.group_name, g.group_cnt, g.group_nowcnt, ga.game_title FROM groupmember AS gm JOIN member AS m ON gm.member_no = m.member_no JOIN studygroup AS g ON gm.group_no = g.group_no JOIN game AS ga ON gm.game_no = ga.game_no WHERE gm.group_no = #{group_no} AND gm.approve_state = '승인'
AND g.group_name = #{group_name}

SELECT p.pay_date, p.pay_enddate, g.game_title, g.game_no, g.game_total, m.member_name, sg.group_no, sg.group_name, sg.group_intro, sg.group_startdate, sg.group_enddate, sg.group_cnt, sg.group_nowcnt FROM pay p INNER JOIN game g ON p.game_no = g.game_no INNER JOIN studygroup sg ON p.game_no = sg.game_no INNER JOIN member m ON p.member_id = m.member_id WHERE p.member_id = #{member_id} AND sg.group_no = #{group_no};

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN sg.group_no <> #{group_no} THEN sg.group_cnt ELSE 0 END) AS total_group_cnt FROM studygroup sg WHERE sg.game_no = #{game_no} AND sg.member_id = #{member_id} GROUP BY sg.game_no, sg.member_id;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS record_count FROM groupmember gm JOIN member m ON gm.member_no = m.member_no JOIN studygroup sg ON gm.group_no = sg.group_no JOIN game g ON gm.game_no = g.game_no WHERE sg.member_id = #{member_id} AND gm.approve_state = '미승인'
AND sg.group_no = #{group_no}

select.if: SELECT sg.group_no, sg.group_name, sg.group_cnt, sg.group_nowcnt, g.game_title, g.game_level, COUNT(CASE WHEN gm.approve_state = '승인' THEN 1 END) AS member_count FROM studygroup sg JOIN game g ON sg.game_no = g.game_no LEFT JOIN groupmember gm ON sg.group_no = gm.group_no WHERE sg.group_no = #{group_no} GROUP BY sg.group_no;

mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.member_name, m.member_no FROM studygroup AS sg JOIN member AS m ON m.member_id = sg.member_id WHERE sg.group_nowcnt < sg.group_cnt;

SELECT group_no FROM studygroup WHERE (group_cnt - group_nowcnt) <> 0
AND group_no = #{group_no}
